definition: outstanding/to fast-track/to elevate/to free oneself from
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: With overwhelming forward vision and decision to change the City's living quality.
sentences.chinese: 以超拔的前瞻力和改變城市居住品質的決斷力。

sentences.english: Only through transcending reality can philosophy become philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 只有超拔於現實，哲學才能成其爲哲學。

sentences.english: In addition, he argued that sages should have super intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他還認爲聖人應該有超拔的智慧。

sentences.english: What obviously the artist pays attention is in some spiritual promoting.
sentences.chinese: 顯然藝術家所關注的是某種精神上的超拔。

sentences.english: Philosophy is the theoretical observation and reflection, not flattering of real life.
sentences.chinese: 只有超拔於現實，哲學才能成其爲哲學。

definition: to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
to understand/to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
